title: Technical Manager
description: - Provide solution about architecture and technologies for projects
- Operate technical team to do code review for projects
- Technical supervisor for big and medium projects
- Improve quality for products about performance, scalability, high availability
- Play as Release Manager and do devops job for some key projects/products at company
- Create technical checklist for project teams:
+ Security checklist (cover all common security issue)
+ Frontend output checklist (best optimization for speed and UX)
+ WordPress development checklist (do it right at the first time, prepare all material for development, deployment and optimization)
+ Deployment checklist (for better use of automation tools and communication)
